top_comments.comment: Played full trilogy and now playing legand love these games
Tomb Raider (2013) & Rise of the Tomb Raider were both amazing games.

32:48

Listening to this with no headphones lol...people would definitely wonder what you're watching.😅
Did any one else notice how Lara's face expressions and body animation reminds of old prince of Persia games, literary dejavu moment.
Sleeper hit of a hidden gem.
